document_data.caption: A map showing Ship Street in the Dock Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Ship Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Ship Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Ship Street connected [[Fish Street (Waterdeep)|Fish Street]] with [[Dock Street (Waterdeep)|Dock Street]] in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]]. It branched south from Fish Street to meander south toward the waterfront and end on Dock Street. Other roads connecting with Ship Street included [[Aline's Way]], [[Keel Alley]], [[Odd Street]], [[Presper Street]], [[Shipwright's Square]], [[Shrimp Alley]], [[Siren Street]], and [[Sternpost Street]].
